verses.verse: And when the people <S%H5971><s%> complained, <S%H596><s%> it displeased <S%H7451><s%> <S%H241><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> it; and his anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled; <S%H2734><s%> and the fire <S%H784><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> burnt <S%H1197><s%> among them, and consumed <S%H398><s%> them that were in the uttermost <S%H7097><s%> parts of the camp. <S%H4264><s%>
And the people <S%H5971><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> to Moses; <S%H4872><s%> and when Moses <S%H4872><s%> prayed <S%H6419><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> was quenched. <S%H8257><s%>

And he called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> Taberah: <S%H8404><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> burnt <S%H1197><s%> among them.

And the mixed multitude <S%H628><s%> that was among <S%H7130><s%> them fell a lusting: <S%H8378><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> wept <S%H1058><s%> again, <S%H7725><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> shall give us flesh <S%H1320><s%> to eat? <S%H398><s%>

We remember <S%H2142><s%> the fish, <S%H1710><s%> which <S%H834><s%> we did eat <S%H398><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> freely; <S%H2600><s%> the cucumbers, <S%H7180><s%> and the melons, <S%H20><s%> and the leeks, <S%H2682><s%> and the onions, <S%H1211><s%> and the garlic: <S%H7762><s%>

But now <S%H6258><s%> our soul <S%H5315><s%> is dried <S%H3001><s%> away: there is nothing <S%H369><s%> <S%H3605><s%> at all, <S%H3605><s%> beside <S%H1115><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> manna, <S%H4478><s%> before our eyes. <S%H5869><s%>
And the manna <S%H4478><s%> was as coriander <S%H1407><s%> seed, <S%H2233><s%> and the color <S%H5869><s%> thereof as the color <S%H5869><s%> of bdellium. <S%H916><s%>

And the people <S%H5971><s%> went <S%H7751><s%> about, <S%H7751><s%> and gathered <S%H3950><s%> it, and ground <S%H2912><s%> it in mills, <S%H7347><s%> or <S%H176><s%> beat <S%H1743><s%> it in a mortar, <S%H4085><s%> and baked <S%H1310><s%> it in pans, <S%H6517><s%> and made <S%H6213><s%> cakes <S%H5692><s%> of it: and the taste <S%H2940><s%> of it was as the taste <S%H2940><s%> of fresh <S%H3955><s%> oil. <S%H8081><s%>
And when the dew <S%H2919><s%> fell <S%H3381><s%> on the camp <S%H4264><s%> in the night, <S%H3915><s%> the manna <S%H4478><s%> fell <S%H3381><s%> on it.

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> weep <S%H1058><s%> throughout their families, <S%H4940><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> in the door <S%H6607><s%> of his tent: <S%H168><s%> and the anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> greatly; <S%H3966><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> also was displeased. <S%H5869><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> have you afflicted <S%H7489><s%> your servant? <S%H5650><s%> and why <S%H4100><s%> have I not found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in your sight, <S%H5869><s%> that you lay <S%H7760><s%> the burden <S%H4853><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> on me?

Have I conceived <S%H2029><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people? <S%H5971><s%> have I begotten <S%H3205><s%> them, that you should say <S%H559><s%> to me, Carry <S%H5375><s%> them in your bosom, <S%H2436><s%> as a nursing <S%H539><s%> father bears <S%H5375><s%> the sucking <S%H3243><s%> child, to the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you swore <S%H7650><s%> to their fathers? <S%H1><s%>

From where <S%H370><s%> should I have flesh <S%H1320><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people? <S%H5971><s%> for they weep <S%H1058><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%> Give <S%H5414><s%> us flesh, <S%H1320><s%> that we may eat. <S%H398><s%>
I am not able <S%H3201><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> alone, <S%H905><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> it is too heavy <S%H3515><s%> for me.

And if <S%H518><s%> you deal <S%H6213><s%> thus <S%H3602><s%> with me, kill <S%H2026><s%> me, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, out of hand, <S%H2026><s%> if <S%H518><s%> I have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in your sight; <S%H5869><s%> and let me not see <S%H7200><s%> my wretchedness. <S%H7451><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Gather <S%H622><s%> to me seventy <S%H7657><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you know <S%H3045><s%> to be the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and officers <S%H7860><s%> over them; and bring <S%H3947><s%> them to the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> that they may stand <S%H3320><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> with you.

And I will come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> and talk <S%H1696><s%> with you there: <S%H8033><s%> and I will take <S%H680><s%> of the spirit <S%H7307><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is on you, and will put <S%H7760><s%> it on them; and they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> the burden <S%H4853><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> with you, that you bear <S%H5375><s%> it not yourself alone. <S%H905><s%>

And say <S%H559><s%> you to the people, <S%H5971><s%> Sanctify <S%H6942><s%> yourselves against to morrow, <S%H4279><s%> and you shall eat <S%H398><s%> flesh: <S%H1320><s%> for you have wept <S%H1058><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> shall give us flesh <S%H1320><s%> to eat? <S%H398><s%> for it was well <S%H2895><s%> with us in Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> therefore the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will give <S%H5414><s%> you flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and you shall eat. <S%H398><s%>

You shall not eat <S%H398><s%> one <S%H259><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> two days, <S%H3117><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%>

But even <S%H5704><s%> a whole <S%H3117><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> it come <S%H3318><s%> out at your nostrils, <S%H639><s%> and it be loathsome <S%H2214><s%> to you: because <S%H3282><s%> that you have despised <S%H3988><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is among <S%H7130><s%> you, and have wept <S%H1058><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, saying, <S%H559><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> we forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt? <S%H4714><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> The people, <S%H5971><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I am, are six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> footmen; <S%H7273><s%> and you have said, <S%H559><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> them flesh, <S%H1320><s%> that they may eat <S%H398><s%> a whole <S%H3117><s%> month. <S%H2320><s%>

Shall the flocks <S%H6629><s%> and the herds <S%H1241><s%> be slain <S%H7819><s%> for them, to suffice <S%H4672><s%> them? or shall all <S%H3605><s%> the fish <S%H1709><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> be gathered <S%H622><s%> together for them, to suffice <S%H4672><s%> them?

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Is the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> waxed short? <S%H7114><s%> you shall see <S%H7200><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> whether my word <S%H1697><s%> shall come <S%H7136><s%> to pass to you or not.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out, and told <S%H1696><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and gathered <S%H622><s%> the seventy <S%H7657><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and set <S%H5975><s%> them round <S%H5439><s%> about the tabernacle. <S%H168><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> in a cloud, <S%H6051><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> to him, and took <S%H680><s%> of the spirit <S%H7307><s%> that was on him, and gave <S%H5414><s%> it to the seventy <S%H7657><s%> elders: <S%H2205><s%> and it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that, when the spirit <S%H7307><s%> rested <S%H5117><s%> on them, they prophesied, <S%H5012><s%> and did not cease. <S%H3254><s%>

But there remained <S%H7604><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> in the camp, <S%H4264><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was Eldad, <S%H419><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the other <S%H8145><s%> Medad: <S%H4312><s%> and the spirit <S%H7307><s%> rested <S%H5117><s%> on them; and they were of them that were written, <S%H3789><s%> but went <S%H3318><s%> not out to the tabernacle: <S%H168><s%> and they prophesied <S%H5012><s%> in the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

And there ran <S%H7323><s%> a young <S%H5288><s%> man, and told <S%H5046><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Eldad <S%H419><s%> and Medad <S%H4312><s%> do prophesy <S%H5012><s%> in the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> the servant <S%H8334><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> one of his young <S%H979><s%> men, answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> My lord <S%H113><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> forbid <S%H3607><s%> them.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, Envy <S%H7065><s%> you for my sake? would <S%H4310><s%> <S%H5414><s%> God that all <S%H3605><s%> the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> were prophets, <S%H5030><s%> and that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> would <S%H4310><s%> <S%H5414><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> his spirit <S%H7307><s%> on them!
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> got <S%H622><s%> him into <S%H413><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%> he and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And there went <S%H5265><s%> forth <S%H5265><s%> a wind <S%H7307><s%> from the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and brought <S%H1468><s%> quails <S%H7958><s%> from the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and let them fall <S%H5203><s%> by the camp, <S%H4264><s%> as it were a day's <S%H3117><s%> journey <S%H1870><s%> on this <S%H3541><s%> side, <S%H3541><s%> and as it were a day's <S%H3117><s%> journey <S%H1870><s%> on the other <S%H3541><s%> side, <S%H3541><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and as it were two cubits <S%H520><s%> high on the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And the people <S%H5971><s%> stood <S%H6965><s%> up all <S%H3605><s%> that day, <S%H3117><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that night, <S%H3915><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the next <S%H4283><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and they gathered <S%H622><s%> the quails: <S%H7958><s%> he that gathered least <S%H4591><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> homers: <S%H2563><s%> and they spread <S%H7849><s%> them all <S%H3605><s%> abroad <S%H7849><s%> for themselves <S%H1992><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

And while the flesh <S%H1320><s%> was yet <S%H5750><s%> between <S%H996><s%> their teeth, <S%H8127><s%> ere <S%H2962><s%> it was chewed, <S%H3772><s%> the wrath <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against the people, <S%H5971><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> with a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H7227><s%> plague. <S%H4347><s%>

And he called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> Kibrothhattaavah: <S%H6914><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> they buried <S%H6912><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that lusted. <S%H183><s%>
And the people <S%H5971><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Kibrothhattaavah <S%H6914><s%> to Hazeroth; <S%H2698><s%> and stayed <S%H1961><s%> at Hazeroth. <S%H2698><s%>
